title: Large one bedroom apartments, Walk to Las Vegas Strip, Bad Credit Ok
posting_body: ['Twain Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Easy freeway access', '-Free premium cable TV', '-On Las Vegas RTC bus line', '-High-speed wireless internet available', '-No long term lease required', '-Full kitchen in apartment', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Large one bedroom apartments', '-Free utilities included with apartment', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Walk to Las Vegas Strip', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
